ubOperating: UB MARKET LTD – An international trading company specializing in the export and import of food products, including sunflower oil, beet sugar, chicken meat, milk, mayonnaise… and other products. We act as a responsible intermediary, connecting leading product manufacturers with wholesale buyers from different countries – through road transport.
weGarantee:
Our main specialization is international trade in sunflower oil. We supply high-quality products in a wide range, directly from reliable manufacturers:
• Sunflower oil (refined, bottled) – PET bottle (0.5/1/5/10 liters);
• Sunflower oil (refined, deodorized, winterized) – bulk (tank trucks);
• Sunflower oil (unrefined, crude) – bulk (tank trucks);
• High-oleic sunflower oil (refined) – bottled and bulk (tank trucks);
• Other types of vegetable oils: (Olive, Soybean, Rapeseed)
aboutUsDescription: Our company supplies high-quality products and operates online, ensuring constant communication and support for our clients, focusing on building mutually beneficial and long-term relationships.
collaboration: International export-import company UB Market LTD, we invite you to collaborate!
ourProductsDescription: Discover our extensive selection of products, carefully curated to meet your needs. From high-quality essentials to exclusive items, explore a diverse range of options designed to offer you value and satisfaction.
exploreProducts: Explore our range of high-quality products
aboutUsTitle: UB MARKET LTD – An international trading company specializing in the export and import of food products, including sunflower oil, beet sugar, chicken meat, milk, mayonnaise… and other products. We act as a responsible intermediary, connecting leading product manufacturers with wholesale buyers from different countries – through road transport.
ourMissionTitle: Our main specialization is international trade in sunflower oil, where we supply high-quality products directly from reliable manufacturers in a wide assortment: refined sunflower oil – bottled in 0.5/1/5/10 liters and in bulk (tankers), unrefined (crude) sunflower oil – in bulk (tankers).
ourVisionTitle: Our company supplies high-quality products and operates online, ensuring constant communication and support for our clients, focusing on building mutually beneficial and long-term relationships.
integrityTitle: We believe in transparency and honesty in every transaction.
qualityTitle: We always choose high-quality products and recommend them to our clients.
customerFocusTitle: Customer satisfaction is the most important indicator of our work.
innovationTitle: We are constantly looking for ways to improve our products and services.
sustainabilityTitle: Today, we strive to do more than we did yesterday...
ourHistoryTitle: Since its founding in 2022, UB Market LTD has grown from a small local supplier to a reliable business partner across Europe. Our success is built on daily hard work, dedication, and a commitment to providing clients with the best services and products. Over the years, we have expanded our operations and diversified our product range, always considering the needs of our clients.
ourTeamTitle: UB Market LTD - a team of qualified professionals passionate about their work. Our team works diligently to find, verify, and deliver products that meet the highest standards of quality and safety.
